user_prompt: Create Banking Website using Azure Infrastructure and provide proper security layers throughout the application

epics.title: Azure Infrastructure Setup for Banking Website
epics.summary: Provision core Azure resources required for hosting the banking website.
epics.description: This epic involves creating and configuring foundational Azure infrastructure components that will serve as the base for the banking website. Tasks include setting up Virtual Networks, Resource Groups, App Services, Load Balancers, and management of staging and production environments. Infrastructure as Code (IaC) will be applied using Terraform or Bicep for repeatable, consistent deployments across environments.

epics.title: Secure Database and Storage Configuration
epics.summary: Implement secure and compliant data storage solutions using Azure services.
epics.description: This epic focuses on setting up secure and scalable databases and storage services for banking data. It includes configuration of Azure SQL Database with Transparent Data Encryption (TDE), backup and restore policies, failover strategies, and Azure Blob Storage with role-based access control. The solution should comply with PCI-DSS standards, ensure encryption at rest and in transit, and implement data retention and auditing policies.

epics.title: Backend Service Development
epics.summary: Develop backend services to support banking operations and transactions.
epics.description: This epic covers development of the server-side logic for key banking functionalities, including customer registration, authentication, transactions, account management, and reporting. These APIs will be developed using secure frameworks like ASP.NET Core or Node.js, with RESTful design, proper exception handling, and input validation. The services will be deployed to Azure App Services or Azure Kubernetes Service with CI/CD integration.

epics.title: Frontend Interface Development
epics.summary: Design and develop customer-facing and administrative user interfaces.
epics.description: This epic involves the design and implementation of intuitive and responsive web interfaces using modern frameworks such as React or Angular. The UI will support different roles such as customers, administrators, and auditors, and will be integrated with backend APIs securely over HTTPS. Adherence to accessibility, usability, and security best practices will be mandatory during the implementation.

epics.title: Security and Compliance Implementation
epics.summary: Apply multilayered security protections and regulatory compliance for the banking application.
epics.description: This epic focuses on enforcing securities across all layers of the Azure banking application. It includes configuring Azure Security Center, Network Security Groups, and Application Gateway with Web Application Firewall. TLS 1.3 encryption, DDoS protection, and strict IAM policies will be implemented. Periodic vulnerability assessments and security audits will ensure compliance with PCI-DSS, ISO 27001, and GDPR requirements.

epics.title: Authentication and Access Management
epics.summary: Implement strong authentication and role-based access control mechanisms.
epics.description: This epic ensures secure and compliant authentication and authorization mechanisms for all users. It includes integrating Azure AD B2C for identity management, enabling Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA), and using OAuth2.0 / OpenID Connect for secure session handling. Role-based and least privilege access models will be used to ensure separation of duties between customers and internal staff.

epics.title: Monitoring, Logging, and Security Auditing
epics.summary: Implement end-to-end observability and auditing measures.
epics.description: This epic includes configuring Azure Monitor, Log Analytics, and Application Insights for centralized monitoring and performance tracking. Logging and telemetry will be integrated across application and infrastructure layers to detect anomalies and potential security incidents. Robust alerting and reporting mechanisms will be established to support ongoing audits and compliance checks.

epics.title: Performance Optimization and Scalability Planning
epics.summary: Optimize performance and scalability of the banking website.
epics.description: This epic aims at enhancing application performance through code optimization, caching, and appropriate use of Azure services. Azure Content Delivery Network (CDN), Auto-Scaling, and Load Balancing will be used to ensure smooth performance under varying loads. Regular load and stress tests will be performed, with optimization recommendations documented and applied.

epics.title: Backup, Disaster Recovery, and Business Continuity
epics.summary: Establish backup and disaster recovery mechanisms for critical banking components.
epics.description: This epic focuses on ensuring business continuity through planned backup and disaster recovery strategies. Azure Backup and Site Recovery will be configured for critical workloads. Geo-redundant storage and automated failover mechanisms will ensure minimal downtime. Regular recovery drills will be performed to validate recovery objectives and maintain compliance.
